channel.title: Coffee on Aenism
channel.description: Recent content in Coffee on Aenism

item.title: Cold brew coffee
item.description: Regular coffee messes with my brain. I only drink coffee as a last resort. When I have to turn in code which I already know how to write and I only have to stay awake and type like a zombie on auto-pilot. Coffee rarely helps when I need to also be creative because I always end up making crap because zombies aren’t very creative. It’s mostly the caffeine overload. Perhaps I’m just too sensitive.
